ygData.subject: Re: Starting a New Cleric Suggestions Please
ygData.msgSnippet: In my experience I would say choose a race that can wear small armor! I play a human cleric on Rallos Zek now and got really disappointed when I see all of
ygData.messageBody:
In my experience I would say choose a race that can wear small armor! I play
a human cleric on Rallos Zek now and got really disappointed when I see all
of these High Elves running around in full bronze while I still wore a
patchwork tunic till level 19 when my friend finally made me some banded.
That is my issue with the human cleric. Go High Elf or Erudite would be kewl
too.

**********************
Human Cleric
Ramsess De'Vizier
Rallos Zek
**********************
----- Original Message -----
From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 1:29 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Starting a New Cleric Suggestions Please


> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
>
> I am going to move to the Race war server. If I had a choice I would play
a
> High Elf Cleric. Which I play on Rallos Zek and Love, Lots of Manna.
>
> However all my friends want to be on the human team. Barbarian, Erudite or
> Human.
> So any ideas on what is best to pick and your reasons. Obviously the
choices
> are Erudite or Human.
>
> The Erudite has more Wisdom
>
> Str Sta Ag Dx W Int Ch
> 65 75 70 70 93 105 70 +30
>
> but the Human is a better all rounder
>
> Str Sta Ag Dx W Int Ch
> 80 80 75 75 85 75 75 +30
>
>
> I looking for people with high level Clerics 20 plus as I do not want
figure
> out I've made a mistake later.
>
>
> Thanks
>
> Chasman
>
